source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran
short_text: The Surah has been so designated after the word ash-shams with which it opens.
text:
The Surah has been so designated after the word ash-shams with which it opens.

Period of Revelation

The subject matter and the style show that this Surah too was revealed in the earliest period at Makkah at a stage when opposition to the Holy Prophet (upon whom be Allah's peace) had grown very strong and intense.

Theme and Subject Matter

Its theme is to distinguish the good from the evil and to warn the people, who were refusing to understand this distinction and insisting on following the evil way, of the evil end.

In view of the subject matter this Surah consists of two parts. The first part consists of vv. 1-10, and the second of vv. 11-15. The first part deals with three things:



That just as the sun and the moon, the day and the night, the earth and the sky, are different from each other and contradictory in their effects and results, so are the good and the evil different front each other and contradictory in their effects and results; they are neither alike in their outward appearance nor can they be alike in their results.


That Allah after giving the human self powers of the body, sense and mind has not left it uninformed in the world, but has instilled into his unconscious by means of a natural inspiration the distinction between good and evil, right and wrong, and the sense of the good to be good and of the evil to be evil.


That the future of man depends on how by using the powers of discrimination, will and judgment that Allah has endowed him with, he develops the good and suppresses the evil tendencies of the self. If he develops the good inclination and frees his self of the evil inclinations, he will attain to eternal success, and if, on the contrary, he suppresses the good and promotes the evil, he will meet with disappointment and failure.


In the second part citing the historical precedent of the people of Thamud the significance of Prophethood has been brought out. A Messenger is raised in the world, because the inspirational knowledge of good and evil that Allah has placed in human nature, is by itself not enough for the guidance of man, but on account of his failure to understand it fully man has been proposing wrong criteria and theories of good and evil and thus going astray. That is why Allah sent down clear and definite Revelation to the Prophets (peace be upon them) to augment man's natural inspiration so that they may expound to the people as to what is good and what is evil. Likewise, the Prophet Salih (peace be upon him) was sent to the people of Thamud, but the people overwhelmed by the evil of their self, had become so rebellious that they rejected him. And when he presented before them the miracle of the she camel, as demanded by themselves, the most wretched one of them, in spite of his warning,
hamstrung it, in accordance with the will and desire of the people. Consequently, the entire tribe was overtaken by a disaster.

While narrating this story of the Thamud nowhere in the Surah has it been said "O people of Quraish, if you rejected your Prophet, Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings), as the Thamud had rejected theirs, you too would meet with the same fate as they met." The conditions at that time in Makkah were similar to those that had been created by the wicked among the people of Thamud against the Prophet Salih (peace be upon him). Therefore, the narration of this story in those conditions was by itself enough to suggest to the people of Makkah how precisely this historical precedent applied to them.
description: The surah that opens with the oath of the Divine One swearing by The Sun as it shines out with morning’s radiance. It is named after “the sun” (al-shams), mentioned in verse 1. The central theme of the surah touch upon purifying or corrupting the soul, with the tribe of Thamūd given as an example of corruption.The surah is also known as: Sol.

Efendi Nahi.verse 91:1: Betohem në Diellin dhe dritën e tij,
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:3: dhe ditën që e bën të dukshëm atë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:5: dhe qiellin dhe Atë që e ka ndërtuar (atë);
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:6: dhe Tokën dhe Atë që e ka shtruar atë (Tokën),
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:7: dhe shpirtin (njeriun e parë) dhe Atë që e krijoi
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:8: e ua ka shpjeguar të mirën e të keqen, -
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:9: me të vërtetë, ai që e pastron atë (shpirtin), do të jetë i lumtur,
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:10: e, me të vërtetë do të humbë ai që e devijon atë (shpirtin)!
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:11: Populli i Themudit, nga shfrenimi i vet – ka përgënjeshtruar:
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:12: kur nga mesi i tyre u ngrit një fatzezë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:13: i dërguari i Perëndisë (Salihu), ju tha atyre: “Lëreni deven e Perëndisë dhe kujdesuni për kohën kur duhet të pijë ajo!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:14: Por ata nuk i besuan (atij), madje e prënë atë (devën) – dhe Zoti i tyre shkatërroi ata për mëkatet e tyre, duke i zhdukur deri në të fundit,
Efendi Nahi.verse 91:15: se, Ai, nuk i druan pasojës nga ajo.

null.verse 91:1: And olsun günəşə və onun işığına (günəşin qalxdığı vaxta);
null.verse 91:2: And olsun (günəşin) ardınca çıxan aya;
null.verse 91:3: And olsun onu (günəşi) parlaq edən gündüzə;
null.verse 91:4: And olsun onu (günəşi) örtən gecəyə;
null.verse 91:5: And olsun göyə və onu yaradana;
null.verse 91:6: And olsun yerə və onu döşəyənə;
null.verse 91:7: And olsun nəfsə və onu yaradana (ona biçim verənə);
null.verse 91:8: Sonra da ona günahlarını və pis əməllərdən çəkinməsini (xeyir və şəri) öyrədənə ki,
null.verse 91:9: Nəfsini (günahlardan) təmizləyən mütləq nicat tapacaqdır!
null.verse 91:10: Onu (günaha) batıran isə, əlbəttə, ziyana uğrayacaqdır.
null.verse 91:11: Səmud (qövmü) azğınlığı üzündən (Saleh peyğəmbəri) təkzib etmişdi.
null.verse 91:12: Onların ən rəzili (Allahın bir mö'cüzəsi olaraq qayanın içindən çıxartdığı dəvəni öldürməyə) qalxdığı zaman
null.verse 91:13: Allahın peyğəmbəri onlara belə demişdi: "Allahın bu dişi (maya) dəvəsinə (toxunmayın), onun su içməsinə (mane olmayın).
null.verse 91:14: Lakin onlar (Salehi) yalançı saydılar və onu (dəvəni) tutub kəsdilər.
null.verse 91:15: (Allah) bu işin aqibətindən qorxmaz! (Allah Səmud qövmünə cəza vermək istəmirdi.

null.verse 91:1: Tako Mi Sunca i svjetla njegova,
null.verse 91:2: i Mjeseca kada ga prati,
null.verse 91:3: i dana kada ga vidljivim učini,
null.verse 91:4: i noći kada ga zakloni,
null.verse 91:5: i neba i Onoga koji ga sazda,
null.verse 91:6: i Zemlje i Onoga koji je ravnom učini,
null.verse 91:7: i duše i Onoga koji je stvori
null.verse 91:8: pa joj put dobra i put zla shvatljivim učini,
null.verse 91:9: uspjeće samo onaj ko je očisti,
null.verse 91:10: a biće izgubljen onaj ko je na stranputicu odvodi!
null.verse 91:11: Semud je zbog obijesti svoje poricao:
null.verse 91:12: kad se jedan nesretnik između njih podigao,
null.verse 91:13: Allahov poslanik im je doviknuo: "Brinite se o Allahovoj kamili i vremenu kad treba da pije!",
null.verse 91:14: ali mu oni nisu povjerovali, već su je zaklali - i Gospodar njihov ih je zbog grijeha njihovih uništio i do posljednjeg istrijebio,
null.verse 91:15: i ne strahujući zbog toga od odgovornosti.

null.verse 91:1: শপথ সূর্যের ও তার কিরণের,
null.verse 91:2: শপথ চন্দ্রের যখন তা সূর্যের পশ্চাতে আসে,
null.verse 91:3: শপথ দিবসের যখন সে সূর্যকে প্রখরভাবে প্রকাশ করে,
null.verse 91:4: শপথ রাত্রির যখন সে সূর্যকে আচ্ছাদিত করে,
null.verse 91:5: শপথ আকাশের এবং যিনি তা নির্মাণ করেছেন, তাঁর।
null.verse 91:6: শপথ পৃথিবীর এবং যিনি তা বিস্তৃত করেছেন, তাঁর,
null.verse 91:7: শপথ প্রাণের এবং যিনি তা সুবিন্যস্ত করেছেন, তাঁর,
null.verse 91:8: অতঃপর তাকে তার অসৎকর্ম ও সৎকর্মের জ্ঞান দান করেছেন,
null.verse 91:9: যে নিজেকে শুদ্ধ করে, সেই সফলকাম হয়।
null.verse 91:10: এবং যে নিজেকে কলুষিত করে, সে ব্যর্থ মনোরথ হয়।
null.verse 91:11: সামুদ সম্প্রদায় অবাধ্যতা বশতঃ মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল।
null.verse 91:12: যখন তাদের সর্বাধিক হতভাগ্য ব্যক্তি তৎপর হয়ে উঠেছিল।
null.verse 91:13: অতঃপর আল্লাহর রসূল তাদেরকে বলেছিলেনঃ আল্লাহর উষ্ট্রী ও তাকে পানি পান করানোর ব্যাপারে সতর্ক থাক।
null.verse 91:14: অতঃপর ওরা তার প্রতি মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল এবং উষ্ট্রীর পা কর্তন করেছিল। তাদের পাপের কারণে তাদের পালনকর্তা তাদের উপর ধ্বংস নাযিল করে একাকার করে দিলেন।
null.verse 91:15: আল্লাহ তা’আলা এই ধ্বংসের কোন বিরূপ পরিণতির আশংকা করেন না। দিলেন।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:1: Кълна се в слънцето и в неговото сияние,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:2: и в луната, която го следва,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:3: и в деня, който го проявява,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:4: и в нощта, която го покрива,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:5: и в небето, и в Онзи, Който го е съградил,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:6: и в земята, и в Онзи, Който я е разпрострял,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:7: и в душата, и в Онзи, Който я е създал,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:8: и на нея е посочил [що е] нечестивост и богобоязливост!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:10: А губи онзи, който се омърсява.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:12: Когато най-злият от тях се втурна към камилата
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:14: им каза: Не посягайте на камилата на Аллах и не й пречете да пие!,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:15: ала го взеха за лъжец и я заклаха, - тогава техният Господ ги унищожи заради греха им - поравно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 91:16: Не се страхува Той за последствието.

null.verse 91:1: 以太陽及其光輝發誓，
null.verse 91:2: 以追隨太陽時的月亮發誓，
null.verse 91:3: 以揭示太陽時的白晝發誓，
null.verse 91:4: 以籠罩太陽時的黑夜發誓，
null.verse 91:5: 以蒼穹及其建築者發誓，
null.verse 91:6: 以大地及其鋪展者發誓，
null.verse 91:7: 以靈魂及使它均衡，
null.verse 91:8: 並啟示他善惡者發誓，
null.verse 91:9: 凡培養自己的性靈者，必定成功；
null.verse 91:10: 凡戕害自己的性靈者，必定失敗。
null.verse 91:11: 賽莫德人已因過分而否認真理。
null.verse 91:12: 當時，他們中最薄命者忙上前來，
null.verse 91:13: 使者就對他們說：「你們讓真主的母駝自由飲水吧。」
null.verse 91:14: 但他們否認使者而宰殺母駝，故他們的主因他們的罪過而毀滅他們，使他們普遍受難。
null.verse 91:15: 他是不顧慮那災難的後果的。 但他們否認使者而宰殺母駝，故他們的主因他們的罪過而毀滅他們，使他們普遍受難。

null.verse 91:1: Při slunci a jeho jasu,
null.verse 91:2: při měsíci, když je následuje,
null.verse 91:3: při dni, když je odhaluje,
null.verse 91:4: při noci, když je zahaluje,
null.verse 91:5: při nebi a při tom, kdo je vystavěl,
null.verse 91:6: při zemi a při tom, kdo ji rozprostřel,
null.verse 91:7: při duši a při tom, kdo dal jí vyrovnanost
null.verse 91:8: a vdechl jí hříšnost i bohabojnost!
null.verse 91:9: Kdo ji očistí, ten jistě vydělá,
null.verse 91:10: a kdo ji zanedbá, ten jistě prodělá.
null.verse 91:11: Ve vzpurnosti své obvinili Thamúdovci (proroka svého) ze lži,
null.verse 91:12: když bezbožník největší povstal mezi nimi.
null.verse 91:13: A pravil jim posel Boží: "(Nedotýkejte se) velbloudice Boží a nechte ji napít!"
null.verse 91:14: Však za lháře jej prohlásili a (velbloudici) podřízli.
null.verse 91:15: aniž se následků toho obával.

null.verse 91:1: Bij de zon en haar licht,
null.verse 91:2: En bij de maan als zij deze volgt,
null.verse 91:3: En bij de dag wanneer hij dezs onthult
null.verse 91:4: En bij de nacht, wanneer hij haar bedekt,
null.verse 91:5: En bij de hemel en de schepping er van.
null.verse 91:6: En bij de aarde en haar uitgestrektheid,
null.verse 91:7: En bij de ziel en haar volmaaktheid,
null.verse 91:8: Hij openbaarde haar wat slecht en wat goed (voor haar) is,
null.verse 91:9: Voorwaar, geslaagd is hij die haar loutert
null.verse 91:10: En voorzeker hij gaat te gronde die haar te gronde richt.
null.verse 91:11: De Samoed verloochenden de boodschap in hun opstandigheid.
null.verse 91:12: Toen de ongelukkigste onder hen opstond,
null.verse 91:13: Zeide de boodschapper van God: "Laat de kamelin van God vrij in haar drinken.
null.verse 91:14: Maar zij verloochenden hem en verlamden haar, daarom vernietigde hun Heer hen totaal om hun zonden en maakte het land met de grond gelijk.
null.verse 91:15: En Hij vreest de gevolgen hiervan niet.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:1: By the sun and his brightness,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:2: And the moon when she followeth him,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:3: And the day when it revealeth him,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:4: And the night when it enshroudeth him,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:5: And the heaven and Him Who built it,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:6: And the earth and Him Who spread it,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:7: And a soul and Him Who perfected it
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:8: And inspired it (with conscience of) what is wrong for it and (what is) right for it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:9: He is indeed successful who causeth it to grow,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:10: And he is indeed a failure who stunteth it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:11: (The tribe of) Thamud denied (the truth) in their rebellious pride,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:12: When the basest of them broke forth
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:13: And the messenger of Allah said: It is the she-camel of Allah, so let her drink!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:14: But they denied him, and they hamstrung her, so Allah doomed them for their sin and rased (their dwellings).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 91:15: He dreadeth not the sequel (of events).

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:1: By the Sun and his (glorious) splendour;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:2: By the Moon as she follows him;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:3: By the Day as it shows up (the Sun’s) glory;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:4: By the Night as it conceals it;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:5: By the Firmament and its (wonderful) structure;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:6: By the Earth and its (wide) expanse:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:7: By the Soul, and the proportion and order given to it;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:8: And its enlightenment as to its wrong and its right;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:9: Truly he succeeds that purifies it,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:10: And he fails that corrupts it!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:11: The Thamud (people) rejected (their prophet) through their inordinate wrong-doing,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:12: Behold, the most wicked man among them was deputed (for impiety).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:13: But the Apostle of God said to them: "It is a She-camel of God! And (bar her not from) having her drink!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:14: Then they rejected him (as a false prophet), and they hamstrung her.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 91:15: And for Him is no fear of its consequences.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:1: By the sun and his morning brightness
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:2: and by the moon when she follows him,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:3: and by the day when it displays him
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:4: and by the night when it enshrouds him!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:5: By the heaven and That which built it
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:6: and by the earth and That which extended it!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:7: By the soul, and That which shaped it
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:8: and inspired it to lewdness and godfearing!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:9: Prosperous is he who purifies it,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:10: and failed has he who seduces it.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:11: Thamood cried lies in their insolence
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:12: when the most wretched of them uprose,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:13: then the Messenger of God said to them, ’The She-camel of God; let her drink!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:14: But they cried him lies, and hamstrung her, so their Lord crushed them for their sin, and leveled them:
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 91:15: and He fears not the issue thereof.

Muhammad Asad.verse 91:1: CONSIDER the sun and its radiant brightness,
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:2: and the moon as it reflects the sun!
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:3: Consider the day as it reveals the world,
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:4: and the night as it veils it darkly!
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:5: Consider the sky and its wondrous make,
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:6: and the earth and all its expanse!
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:7: Consider the human self, and how it is formed in accordance with what it is meant to be,
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:8: and how it is imbued with moral failings as well as with consciousness of God!
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:9: To a happy state shall indeed attain he who causes this
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:11: and truly lost is he who buries it [in darkness].
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:13: TRUTH gave the lie, in their overweening arrogance, [the tribe of] Thamūd,
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:14: when that most hapless wretch from among them rushed forward [to commit his evil deed],
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:15: although God’s apostle had told them, "It is a she-camel belonging to God, so let her drink [and do her no harm]!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:16: But they gave him the lie, and cruelly slaughtered her – whereupon their Sustainer visited them with utter destruction for this their sin, destroying them all alike:
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:17: for none [of them] had any fear of what might befall them.
Muhammad Asad.verse 91:18: that which has inspired it with its immoral doings (fujūrahā) and its God-consciousness (taqwāhā)” – i.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:1: I swear by the sun and his broad light,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:2: and by the moon when she follows him,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:3: and by the day when it shows his brightness,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:4: and by the night when it envelops him,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:5: and by the sky, and the One who built it,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:6: and by the earth, and the One who spread it,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:7: and by the soul, and the One who made it well,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:8: then inspired it with its (instincts of) evil and piety,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:9: success is really attained by him who purifies it,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:10: and failure is really suffered by him who pollutes it.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:11: (The People of) Thamūd denied the truth because of their transgression,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:12: when rose up the one who was most wretched of them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:13: So, the Messenger of Allah said to them, “Be careful of Allah’s she-camel and her right to drink.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:14: But they rejected him and killed her, so their Lord sent eradicating torment upon them because of their sin, and made it equal for all.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 91:15: And He has no fear of its consequence.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:1: By the sun and her morning light,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:3: the moon when it follows her,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:5: the day when it reveals her,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:7: the night when it enshrouds her.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:8: By the heaven and the One Who built it,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:10: the earth and the One Who spread it,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:12: the soul and the One Who proportioned it,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:13: and inspired to discern its vices and piety.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:14: Successful indeed will be the one who purifies it,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:15: and he will indeed have failed he who eclipses it.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:16: Thamūd denied because of their rebellious nature,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:17: when the most wretched of them was dispatched.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:18: But then the messenger of God said to them, ‘[This is] the she-camel of God, so let her have her drink!’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:19: But they denied him, then hamstrung her.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 91:20: And He does not fear the consequence of it.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:1: By the sun and by its brightness,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:2: And by the moon when it follows the sun (i.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:3: And by the day when it displays the sun (i.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:4: And by the night when it draws a veil over the sun (from one of the hemispheres of the earth),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:5: And by the heaven and by that (energy) which built it (with Allah’s permission in the form of a vast universe),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:6: And by the earth and by that (force which, by Allah’s command,) pulled it (from the sun far) apart.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:7: And by the human soul and by the One Who provided it with an all-dimensional poise, proportion and perfection,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:8: Then He inspired it with (discrimination between) vice and virtue,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:9: Indeed, the one who purifies his (ill-commanding) self (from all vain and vicious desires and cultivates in it virtue and piousness) succeeds,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:10: But the one who corrupts himself (in sins and suppresses virtue) is doomed indeed.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:11: The people of Thamud rejected (their Messenger Salih) due to their rebellion.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:12: When the most wretched of them stood up,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:13: Allah’s Messenger said to them: ‘Guard (that) she-camel and (the time of) her taking water.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:14: But they rejected the Messenger and hamstrung (the she-camel).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 91:15: And Allah does not fear any repercussions of this (devastation).

null.verse 91:1: Kautta auringon ja sen kirkkauden,
null.verse 91:2: kautta valonsa lainaavan kuun,
null.verse 91:3: kautta päivän, joka paljastaa kaiken näkyväisen,
null.verse 91:4: kautta yön, joka sen verhoonsa peittää,
null.verse 91:5: kautta taivaan ja Hänen, joka sen rakensi,
null.verse 91:6: kautta maan ja Hänen, joka sen laajaksi levitti,
null.verse 91:7: kautta sielun ja Hänen, joka teki sen täydelliseksi
null.verse 91:8: ja ilmaisi sille, mikä turmio on totuuden hylkäämisestä ja mikä menestys pahan karttamisesta!
null.verse 91:9: Totisesti autuas on se, joka säilyttää sielunsa puhtaana,
null.verse 91:10: ja totisesti on tuhon oma se, joka sen turmelee!
null.verse 91:11: Tamuud teki syntiä ja väitti totuutta valheeksi.
null.verse 91:12: Kun kurjimmat heidän joukostaan ryhtyivät riettauksiinsa,
null.verse 91:13: silloin Jumalan sananjulistaja puhui heille Jumalan naaraskameelista ja sen juottamisesta,
null.verse 91:14: mutta he kohtelivat häntä kuin valehtelijaa ja katkoivat kameelilta jäsenet, ja heidän Herransa kukisti heidät heidän syntiensä tähden ja tuhosi heidät maan tasalle,
null.verse 91:15: eikä Hän pelännyt seurauksia.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:1: Par le soleil et sa clarté !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:2: Par la lune quand elle le suit !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:3: Par le jour quand il le fait rayonner !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:4: Par la nuit quand elle le recouvre !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:11: Il lui a inspiré son libertinage et sa piété ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:14: Les Thamoud, dans leur révolte, criaient au mensonge
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:15: lorsque le plus misérable d'entre eux s'est levé.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:16: L'Envoyé de Dieu leur avait dit : " La chamelle de Dieu !.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:17: Ils l'ont traité de menteur et ils ont tranché les jarrets de la chamelle.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 91:18: et leur disparition ne Lui cause nulle appréhension.

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:1: Par le soleil et par sa clarté !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:2: Et par la lune quand elle le suit !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:3: Et par le jour quand il l’éclaire !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:4: Et par la nuit quand elle l’enveloppe !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:5: Et par le ciel et Celui qui l’a construit !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:6: Et par la terre et Celui qui l’a étendue !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:7: Et par l’âme et Celui qui l’a harmonieusement façonnée;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:8: et lui a alors inspiré son immoralité, de même que sa piété !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:9: A réussi, certes celui qui la purifie.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:10: Et est perdu, certes, celui qui la corrompt.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:11: Les Tamud, par leur transgression, ont crié au mensonge,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:12: lorsque le plus misérable d’entre eux se leva (pour tuer la chamelle)
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:13: Le Messager de Dieu leur avait dit : «La chamelle de Dieu ! Laissez-la boire»
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:14: Mais, ils le traitèrent de menteur, et la tuèrent.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 91:15: Et Dieu n’a aucune crainte des conséquences : tous.

null.verse 91:1: Bei der Sonne und bei ihrem Glanz,
null.verse 91:2: Und bei dem Mond, wenn er ihr folgt,
null.verse 91:3: Und bei dem Tag, wenn er sie enthüllt,
null.verse 91:4: Und bei der Nacht, wenn sie sie bedeckt,
null.verse 91:5: Und bei dem Himmel und seiner Erbauung,
null.verse 91:6: Und bei der Erde und ihrer Ausbreitung,
null.verse 91:7: Und bei der Seele und ihrer Vollendung -
null.verse 91:8: Er gewährte ihr den Sinn für das, was für sie unrecht und was für sie recht ist.
null.verse 91:9: Wahrlich, wer sie lauterer werden läßt, der wird Erfolg haben;
null.verse 91:10: Und wer sie in Verderbnis hinabsinken läßt, der wird zuschanden.
null.verse 91:11: Die Thamüd leugneten die Wahrheit in ihrem Trotz.
null.verse 91:12: Als der Schlechteste unter ihnen aufstand,
null.verse 91:13: Da sprach der Gesandte Allahs: «Haltet euch fern von der Kamelstute Allahs und von ihrer Tränke!»
null.verse 91:14: Jedoch sie verwarfen ihn und schnitten ihr die Sehnen durch, darum vernichtete ihr Herr sie gänzlich für ihre Sünde und machte (die Vernichtung) allen gleich.
null.verse 91:15: Und Er fürchtet die Folgen nicht.

null.verse 91:1: Demi matahari dan cahayanya di pagi hari,
null.verse 91:2: dan bulan apabila mengiringinya,
null.verse 91:3: dan siang apabila menampakkannya,
null.verse 91:4: dan malam apabila menutupinya,
null.verse 91:5: dan langit serta pembinaannya,
null.verse 91:6: dan bumi serta penghamparannya,
null.verse 91:7: dan jiwa serta penyempurnaannya (ciptaannya),
null.verse 91:8: maka Allah mengilhamkan kepada jiwa itu (jalan) kefasikan dan ketakwaannya,
null.verse 91:9: sesungguhnya beruntunglah orang yang menyucikan jiwa itu,
null.verse 91:10: dan sesungguhnya merugilah orang yang mengotorinya.
null.verse 91:11: (Kaum) Tsamud telah mendustakan (rasulnya) karena mereka melampaui batas,
null.verse 91:12: ketika bangkit orang yang paling celaka di antara mereka,
null.verse 91:13: lalu Rasul Allah (Saleh) berkata kepada mereka: ("Biarkanlah) unta betina Allah dan minumannya".
null.verse 91:14: Lalu mereka mendustakannya dan menyembelih unta itu, maka Tuhan mereka membinasakan mereka disebabkan dosa mereka, lalu Allah menyama-ratakan mereka (dengan tanah).
null.verse 91:15: dan Allah tidak takut terhadap akibat tindakan-Nya itu.

null.verse 91:1: Per il sole e il suo fulgore,
null.verse 91:2: per la luna quando lo segue,
null.verse 91:3: per il giorno quando rischiara [la terra],
null.verse 91:4: per la notte quando la copre,
null.verse 91:5: per il cielo e Ciò che lo ha edificato,
null.verse 91:6: per la terra e Ciò che l'ha distesa,
null.verse 91:7: per l'anima e Ciò che l'ha formata armoniosamente
null.verse 91:8: ispirandole empietà e devozione .
null.verse 91:9: Ha successo invero chi la purifica,
null.verse 91:10: è perduto chi la corrompe.
null.verse 91:11: I Thamûd, per arroganza, tacciarono di menzogna,
null.verse 91:12: quando si alzò il più miserabile di loro.
null.verse 91:13: Il Messaggero di Allah aveva detto loro: «
null.verse 91:14: è la cammella di Allah,
null.verse 91:15: il suo turno per bere» .
null.verse 91:16: Lo tacciarono di impostura e le tagliarono i garetti: li annientò il loro Signore per il loro peccato,

null.verse 91:1: 太陽とその輝きにおいて，
null.verse 91:2: それに従う月において，
null.verse 91:3: （太陽を）輝き現わす昼において，
null.verse 91:4: それを覆う夜において，
null.verse 91:5: 天と，それを打ち建てた御方において，
null.verse 91:6: 大地と，それを広げた御方において，
null.verse 91:7: 魂と，それを釣合い秩序付けた御方において，
null.verse 91:8: 邪悪と信心に就いて，それ（魂）に示唆した御方において（誓う）。
null.verse 91:9: 本当にそれ（魂）を清める者は成功し，
null.verse 91:10: それを汚す者は滅びる。
null.verse 91:11: サムード（の民）は，その法外な行いによって（預言者を）嘘付き呼ばわりした。
null.verse 91:12: かれらの中の最も邪悪の者が（不信心のため）立ち上がった時，
null.verse 91:13: アッラーの使徒（サーリフ）はかれらに，「アッラーの雌骼駝である。それに水を飲ませなさい。」と言った。
null.verse 91:14: だがかれらは，かれを嘘付き者と呼び，その膝の腱を切っ（て不具にし）た。それで主は，その罪のためにかれらを滅ぼし，平らげられた。
null.verse 91:15: かれは，その結果を顧慮されない。 だがかれらは，かれを嘘付き者と呼び，その膝の腱を切っ（て不具にし）た。それで主は，その罪のためにかれらを滅ぼし，平らげられた。

null.verse 91:1: 태양과 그 빛을 두고 맹세하사
null.verse 91:2: 그 뒤를 이은 달을 두고 맹세하며
null.verse 91:3: 태양의 영광을 보여주는 낮을두고 맹세하며
null.verse 91:4: 그것을 숨기는 밤을 두고 맹 세하며
null.verse 91:5: 하늘과 그것을 세운 주님을 두고 맹세하사
null.verse 91:6: 대지와 그것을 펼쳐 놓으신 주님을 두고 맹세하며
null.verse 91:7: 인간과 그것을 창조한 주님을두고 맹세하사
null.verse 91:8: 선과 악이 무엇인가를 이해하 도록 하셨나니
null.verse 91:9: 스스로를 순결하게 하는 자가 승리자이며
null.verse 91:10: 스스로를 불결하게 하는 자 실패한 자라
null.verse 91:11: 사무드 백성은 그들의 오만 으로 예언자를 거역하였으매
null.verse 91:12: 그들 중 가장 사악한 자가 일어섰을 때
null.verse 91:13: 선지자가 그들에게 말하길 그것은 하나님의 암낙타이니 그것 이 물을 마시매 방해하지 말라 하 였으나
null.verse 91:14: 그들은 그를 거역한 후 그 암낙타를 살해하였으니 그 죄악으 로 인하여 주님은 그들을 멸망케 하사 구별없이 완전 멸망케 하셨 노라
null.verse 91:15: 실로 그분은 그 결과에 대하여 조금도 염려하지 아니 하시니라

null.verse 91:1: سوێند به خۆر و تیشكی خۆراکه له سه‌ره‌تایی ڕۆژدا سه‌رهه‌ڵده‌دا).
null.verse 91:2: سوێند به مانگ، کاتێك به‌شوێنیدا دێت.
null.verse 91:3: سوێند به ڕۆژ کاتێک که خۆر ده‌رده‌خات.
null.verse 91:4: سوێند به شه‌و که خۆر داده‌پۆشیت.
null.verse 91:5: سوێند به ئاسمان و به‌و زاته به ده‌سه‌ڵاته‌ی دروستی کردووه‌.
null.verse 91:6: سوێند به زه‌وی و به‌و زاته‌ی که به‌شێوه‌ی هێلکه‌یی دایناوه‌.
null.verse 91:7: سوێند به ده‌روون و ئه‌و زاته‌ی که به ڕێک و پێکی به‌دیهێناوه‌.
null.verse 91:8: جا توانای خراپه و چاکه و خوانه‌ناسی و خواناسی تێدا دابین کردووه‌.
null.verse 91:9: (سوێند به‌وانه هه‌موو) به‌ڕاستی ئه‌و که‌سه سه‌رفرازه که نه‌فسی پاک و پوخته کردووه و ئیمان و ترسی خوای تیادا ڕواندووه‌.
null.verse 91:10: بێگومان نائومێد بوو ئه‌و که‌سه‌ی نه‌فسی خۆی ناپوخت کرد و ئاڵوده‌ی گوناهو تاوان و خراپه‌ی کرد.
null.verse 91:11: قه‌ومی ثمود به‌هۆی سه‌رکه‌شی و یاخی بوونیانه‌وه‌، بڕوایان به پێغه‌مبه‌ره‌که‌یان نه‌هێنا.
null.verse 91:12: کاتێک شه‌قاوه و خوانه‌ناسترین که‌سیان خۆیی ڕاپسکاند (بۆ سه‌ربڕینی وشتره‌که‌).
null.verse 91:13: جا پێغه‌مبه‌ری خوا (صاڵح) پێی وتن: واز بهێنن له‌م وشتره که موعجیزه‌ی خوایه‌، مۆڵه‌تی بده‌ن له نۆره ئاوه‌که‌ی خۆیدا ئاو بخواته‌وه‌.
null.verse 91:14: که‌چی بڕوایان به هه‌ره‌شه‌کانی نه‌کرد، ئینجا وشتره‌که‌یان سه‌ربڕی، ئه‌وسا ئیتر په‌روه‌ردگاریان وڵاتی کاولکردن و له‌گه‌ڵ زه‌ویدا ته‌ختی کرد به‌سه‌ریاندا و که‌سیان ڕزگاری نه‌بوو (به‌هۆی گوناهو تاوانیانه‌وه‌).
null.verse 91:15: له کاتێکدا که خوای به‌ده‌سه‌ڵات له سه‌ره‌نجامی ئه‌و کاره‌یشی هه‌رگیز ناترسێت.

null.verse 91:1: Demi matahari dan cahayanya yang terang-benderang;
null.verse 91:2: Dan bulan apabila ia mengiringinya;
null.verse 91:3: Dan siang apabila ia memperlihatkannya dengan jelas nyata;
null.verse 91:4: Dan malam apabila ia menyelubunginya (dengan gelap- gelita),
null.verse 91:5: Demi langit dan Yang membinanya (dalam bentuk yang kuat kukuh yang melambangkan kekuasaanNya);
null.verse 91:6: Serta bumi dan Yang menghamparkannya (untuk kemudahan makhluk-makhlukNya);
null.verse 91:7: Demi diri manusia dan Yang menyempurnakan kejadiannya (dengan kelengkapan yang sesuai dengan keadaannya);
null.verse 91:8: Serta mengilhamkannya (untuk mengenal) jalan yang membawanya kepada kejahatan, dan yang membawanya kepada bertakwa;
null.verse 91:9: Sesungguhnya berjayalah orang yang menjadikan dirinya yang sedia bersih bertambah-tambah bersih (dengan iman dan amal kebajikan),
null.verse 91:10: Dan sesungguhnya hampalah orang yang menjadikan dirinya yang sedia bersih itu susut dan terbenam kebersihannya (dengan sebab kekotoran maksiat).
null.verse 91:11: (Ingatlah), kaum Thamud telah mendustakan (Rasulnya) dengan sebab perbuatan derhaka mereka yang melampaui batas;
null.verse 91:12: Ketika orang yang paling jahat di antara mereka menerima perintah dari mereka (supaya membunuh unta yang menjadi mukjizat),
null.verse 91:13: Maka berkatalah Rasul Allah (Nabi Soleh) kepada mereka: (Janganlah kamu ganggu) unta betina dari Allah itu dan (janganlah kamu menyekatnya daripada mendapat) air minumnya (supaya kamu tidak ditimpa azab)!
null.verse 91:14: (Setelah Nabi Soleh memberi amaran) lalu mereka mendustakannya serta menyembelih unta itu.
null.verse 91:15: Dan Allah tidak hiraukan kesudahan (mereka) yang demikian, (kerana itu adalah balasan yang adil).

null.verse 91:1: به خورشيد و گسترش نور آن سوگند،
null.verse 91:2: و به ماه هنگامى كه بعد از آن درآيد،
null.verse 91:3: و به روز هنگامى كه صفحه زمين را روشن سازد،
null.verse 91:4: و به شب آن هنگام كه زمين را بپوشاند،
null.verse 91:5: و قسم به آسمان و كسى كه آسمان را بنا كرده،
null.verse 91:6: و به زمين و كسى كه آن را گسترانيده،
null.verse 91:7: و قسم به جان آدمى و آن كس كه آن را (آفريده و) منظم ساخته،
null.verse 91:8: سپس فجور و تقوا (شر و خيرش) را به او الهام كرده است،
null.verse 91:9: كه هر كس نفس خود را پاك و تزكيه كرده، رستگار شده;
null.verse 91:10: و آن كس كه نفس خويش را با معصيت و گناه آلوده ساخته، نوميد و محروم گشته است!
null.verse 91:11: قوم «ثمود» بر اثر طغيان، (پيامبرشان را) تكذيب كردند،
null.verse 91:12: آنگاه كه شقى‏ترين آنها بپاخاست،
null.verse 91:13: و فرستاده الهى ( صالح) به آنان گفت: «ناقه خدا ( همان شترى كه معجزه الهى بود) را با آبشخورش واگذاريد (و مزاحم آن نشويد)!»
null.verse 91:14: ولى آنها او را تكذيب و ناقه را پى كردند (و به هلاكت رساندند); از اين رو پروردگارشان آنها (و سرزمينشان) را بخاطر گناهانشان در هم كوبيد و با خاك يكسان و صاف كرد!
null.verse 91:15: و او هرگز از فرجام اين كار ( مجازات ستمگران) بيم ندارد!

null.verse 91:1: Pelo sol e pelo seu esplendor (matinal),
null.verse 91:2: Pela lua, que o segue,
null.verse 91:3: Pelo dia, que o revela,
null.verse 91:4: Pela noite, que o encobre.
null.verse 91:5: Pelo firmamento e por Quem o construiu,
null.verse 91:6: Pela terra e por Quem a dilatou,
null.verse 91:7: Pela alma e por Quem aperfeiçoou,
null.verse 91:8: E lhe imprimiu o discernimento entre o que é certo e o que é errado,
null.verse 91:9: Que será venturoso quem a purificar (a alma),
null.verse 91:10: E desventurado quem a corromper.
null.verse 91:11: A tribo de Tamud, por suas transgressões, desmentiu o seu mensageiro.
null.verse 91:12: E o mais perverso deles se incumbiu (de matar a camela).
null.verse 91:13: Porém, o mensageiro de Deus lhes disse: É a camela de Deus! Não a priveis da sua bebida!
null.verse 91:14: Porém, desmentiram-no e a esquartejaram, pelo que o seu Senhor os exterminou, pelos seus pecados, a todos por igual.
null.verse 91:15: E Ele não teme as conseqüências.

Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:1: Pe Soare și pe strãlucirea lui
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:2: Și pe Luna care îi urmeazã!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:3: Pe ziua care îl face sã strãluceascã
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:4: Și pe noaptea care îl acoperã!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:5: Pe cer și pe ceea ce l-a înãlțat
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:6: Și pe pãmânt și pe ceea ce l-a fãcut întins!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:7: Și pe suflet și pe ceea ce l-a plãsmuit
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:8: Și i-a insuflat lui nelegiuirea sa și evlavia sa!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:10: Și pierdut este cel care-l stricã!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:13: Când s-a ridicat cel mai ticãlos dintre ei.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:14: Trimisul lui Allah le-a zis lor: "Este cãmila lui Allah, adãpați-o!"
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:15: Însã ei l-au socotit mincinos și au junghiat-o.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 91:17: Fãrã ca El sã Se teamã de urmare! toți,

George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:5: Pe cer! Şi cum l-a zidit!
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:6: Pe pământ! Şi cum l-a întins!
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:7: Pe suflet! Şi cum l-a plăsmuit, punând în el desfrâu şi pioşenie!
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:8: Ferice de cel care şi-l mântuie!
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:9: Cel care şi-l întinează însă este pierdut!
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:11: iar cei mai nemernici dintre ei au ieşit în faţă.
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:12: Trimisul lui Dumnezeu le spuse: “Este cămila lui Dumnezeu! Lăsăţi-o să bea!”
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:13: Ei l-au făcut mincinos şi au ologit cămila.
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:14: Pentru păcatul lor, Domnul lor i-a făcut fărâme pe toţi deopotrivă
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 91:15: şi nu s-a temut de urmare.

null.verse 91:1: В знак солнца и сияния его
null.verse 91:2: И в знак луны, что следует за ним,
null.verse 91:3: В знак дня, когда он раскрывает свет,
null.verse 91:4: В знак ночи той,Когда (на солнце) свой покров онанакинет, —
null.verse 91:5: В знак ночи той,Когда (на солнце) свой покров онанакинет, —
null.verse 91:6: Клянусь землейИ тем, как распростерт ее покров,
null.verse 91:7: И всякою душой,И соразмерностью ее(Для проживания на сей земле),
null.verse 91:8: Ее прозрением о том, что праведно,что скверно, —
null.verse 91:9: Поистине, восторжествует тот,Кто чистоту ее блюдет,
null.verse 91:10: Потерпит пораженье тот,Кто развратит ее!
null.verse 91:11: Отвергли своего пророка самудяне,Творя чрезмерные грехи,
null.verse 91:12: И вот злосчастнейший из нихБыл избран для греха2326.
null.verse 91:13: Посланник же Аллаха им сказал:«Его верблюдица (пред вами),И вы должны ей не мешать испитьводы».
null.verse 91:14: Они сочли его лжецомИ ей2327 подрезали (колени).
null.verse 91:15: Ведь для Него не существует страхаЗа следствие (Его свершений).

null.verse 91:1: ¡Por el sol y su claridad!
null.verse 91:2: ¡Por la luna cuando le sigue!
null.verse 91:3: ¡Por el día cuando lo muestra brillante!
null.verse 91:4: ¡Por la noche cuando lo vela!
null.verse 91:5: ¡Por el cielo y Quien lo ha edificado!
null.verse 91:6: ¡Por la tierra y Quien la ha extentido!
null.verse 91:7: ¡Por el alma y Quien le ha dado forma armoniosa,
null.verse 91:8: instruyéndole sobre su propensión al pecado y su temor de Dios!
null.verse 91:9: ¡Bienaventurado quien la purifique!
null.verse 91:10: ¡Decepcionado, empero, quien la corrompa!
null.verse 91:11: Los tamudeos, en su arrogancia, desmintieron.
null.verse 91:12: Cuando el más miserable de entre ellos se alzó.
null.verse 91:13: El enviado de Dios les dijo: «¡Dejad a la camella de Dios y que beba!»
null.verse 91:14: Le desmintieron y la desjarretaron.
null.verse 91:15: sin temer las consecuencias de ello.

null.verse 91:1: சூரியன் மீதும், அதன் பிரகாசத்தின் மீதும் சத்தியமாக
null.verse 91:2: (பின்) அதனைத் தொடர்ந்து வரும் சந்திரன் மீதும் சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 91:3: (சூரியனால்) பகல் வெளியாகும்போது, அதன் மீதும் சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 91:4: (அப்பகலை) மூடிக்கொள்ளும் இரவின் மீதும் சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 91:5: வானத்தின் மீதும், அதை(ஒழுங்குற) அமைந்திருப்பதின் மீதும் சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 91:6: பூமியின் மீதும், இன்னும் அதை விரித்ததின் மீதும் சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 91:7: ஆத்மாவின் மீதும், அதை ஒழுங்குபடுத்தியவன் மீதும் சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 91:8: அப்பால், அவன் (அல்லாஹ்) அதற்கு அதன் தீமையையும், அதன் நன்மையையும் உணர்த்தினான்.
null.verse 91:9: அதை (ஆத்மாவை)ப் பரிசுத்தமாக்கியவர் திடமாக வெற்றியடைந்தார்.
null.verse 91:10: ஆனால் எவன் அதை(ப் பாவத்தில்) புகுத்தினானோ அவன் திட்டமாகத் தோல்வி அடைந்தான்.
null.verse 91:11: 'ஸமூது' (கூட்டத்தினர்) தங்கள் அக்கிரமத்தினால் (ஸாலிஹ் நபியைப்) பொய்ப்பித்தனர்.
null.verse 91:12: அவர்களில் கேடுகெட்ட ஒருவன் விரைந்து முன் வந்தபோது,
null.verse 91:13: அல்லாஹ்வின் தூதர் (ஸாலிஹ்) அவர்களை நோக்கி: "இப் பெண் ஒட்டகம் அல்லாஹ்வுடையது, இது தண்ணீர் அருந்த(த் தடை செய்யாது) விட்டு விடுங்கள்" என்று கூறினார்.
null.verse 91:14: ஆனால், அவர்கள் அவரைப் பொய்ப்பித்து, அதன் கால் நரம்பைத் தறித்து விட்டனர் - ஆகவே, அவர்களின் இந்தப் பாவத்தின் காரணமாக அவர்களுடைய இறைவன் அவர்கள் மீது வேதனையை இறக்கி, அவர்கள் யாவரையும் (அழித்துச்) சரியாக்கி விட்டான்.
null.verse 91:15: அதன் முடிவைப் பற்றி அவன் பயப்படவில்லை.

null.verse 91:1: ขอสาบานด้วยดวงอาทิตย์ และแสงสว่างของมัน
null.verse 91:2: และด้วยดวงจันทร์ เมื่อโคจรตามหลังมัน
null.verse 91:3: และด้วยเวลากลางวันเมื่อประกายแสงมัน (จากดวงอาทิตย์)
null.verse 91:4: และด้วยเวลากลางคืนเมื่อปกคลุมมัน
null.verse 91:5: และด้วยชั้นฟ้า และที่พระองค์ทรงสร้างมัน
null.verse 91:6: และด้วยแผ่นดิน และที่พระองค์ทรงแผ่มัน
null.verse 91:7: และด้วยชีวิต และที่พระองค์ทรงทำให้มันสมบูรณ์
null.verse 91:8: แล้วพระองค์ทรงดลใจมันให้รู้ทางชั่วของมันและทางสำรวมของมัน
null.verse 91:9: แน่นอนผู้ขัดเกลาชีวิตย่อมได้รับความสำเร็จ
null.verse 91:10: และแน่นอนผู้หมกมุ่นมัน (ด้วยการทำชั่ว) ย่อมล้มเหลว
null.verse 91:11: พวกซะมูดได้ปฏิเสธด้วยการละเมิดขอบเขตของพวกเขา
null.verse 91:12: เมื่อคนเลวทรามที่สุดของพวกเขาได้รีบรุดไป (ฆ่าอูฐตัวเมีย)
null.verse 91:13: แล้วร่อซู้ลของอัลลอฮ์ จึงกล่าวแก่พวกเขาว่า (อย่าทำร้าย) อูฐของอัลลอฮ์ และ (อย่าขัดขวาง) การดื่มน้ำของมัน
null.verse 91:14: แต่พวกเขาก็ไม่เชื่อนบีแล้วพวกเขาก็ได้ฆ่ามัน ดังนั้นพระเจ้าของพวกเขาจึงได้ทำลายล้างพวกเขาเนื่องจากเพราะความผิดของพวกเขา แล้วพระองค์ทรงลงโทษพวกเขาอย่างถ้วนหน้ากัน
null.verse 91:15: และพระองค์มิทรงหวาดหวั่นต่อปั้นปลายพวกมัน

null.verse 91:1: Güneşe ve kuşluk vaktindeki aydınlığına
null.verse 91:2: Güneşi
null.verse 91:3: takip ettiğinde Ay'a,
null.verse 91:4: Onu
null.verse 91:5: açığa çıkarttığında gündüze,
null.verse 91:6: Onu
null.verse 91:7: örttüğünde geceye,
null.verse 91:8: Gökyüzüne
null.verse 91:9: ve onu bina edene,
null.verse 91:10: Yere
null.verse 91:11: ve onu yapıp döşeyene,
null.verse 91:12: Nefse
null.verse 91:13: ve ona birtakım kabiliyetler verene,
null.verse 91:14: Sonra
null.verse 91:15: da ona iyilik ve kötülükleri ilham edene yemin ederim ki,
null.verse 91:20: Semud kavmi azgınlığı yüzünden (Allah'ın elçisini) yalanladı.
null.verse 91:21: Onların en bedbahtı (deveyi kesmek için) atıldığında,
null.verse 91:23: Resûlü onlara: "Allah'ın devesine ve onun su hakkına dokunmayın!" dedi.
null.verse 91:25: onlar, onu yalanladılar ve deveyi kestiler.
null.verse 91:27: bu şekilde azap etmenin) âkıbetinden korkacak değil ya! (Allah,

null.verse 91:1: سورج کی قسم اور اس کی روشنی کی
null.verse 91:2: سورج کي قَسم اور اس کي روشني کي قَسمo
null.verse 91:3: اور چاند کي قَسم جب وہ سورج کي پيروي کرے (يعني اس کي روشني سے چمکے)o
null.verse 91:4: اور چاند کی جب اس کے پیچھے نکلے
null.verse 91:5: اور دن کی جب اُسے چمکا دے
null.verse 91:6: اور دن کي قَسم جب وہ سورج کو ظاہر کرے (يعني اسے روشن دکھائے)o
null.verse 91:7: اور رات کي قَسم جب وہ سورج کو (زمين کي ايک سمت سے) ڈھانپ لےo
null.verse 91:8: اور رات کی جب اُسے چھپا لے
null.verse 91:9: اور آسمان کی اور اس ذات کی جس نے اسے بنایا
null.verse 91:10: اور آسمان کي قَسم اور اس (قوت) کي قَسم جس نے اسے (اذنِ ال?ہي سے ايک وسيع کائنات کي شکل ميں) تعمير کياo
null.verse 91:11: اور زمين کي قَسم اور اس (قوت) کي قَسم جو اسے (امرِ ال?ہي سے سورج سے کھينچ دور) لے گئيo
null.verse 91:12: اور زمین کی اور اس کی جس نے اسے پھیلایا
null.verse 91:13: اور انسان کی اور اس کی جس نے اس (کے اعضا) کو برابر کیا
null.verse 91:14: اور انساني جان کي قَسم اور اسے ہمہ پہلو توازن و درستگي دينے والے کي قَسمo
null.verse 91:15: پھر اس نے اسے اس کي بدکاري اور پرہيزگاري (کي تميز) سمجھا ديo
null.verse 91:16: پھر اس کو بدکاری (سے بچنے) اور پرہیزگاری کرنے کی سمجھ دی
null.verse 91:17: کہ جس نے (اپنے) نفس (یعنی روح) کو پاک رکھا وہ مراد کو پہنچا
null.verse 91:18: بيشک وہ شخص فلاح پا گيا جس نے اس (نفس) کو (رذائل سے) پاک کر ليا (اور اس ميں نيکي کي نشو و نما کي)o
null.verse 91:19: اور بيشک وہ شخص نامراد ہوگيا جس نے اسے (گناہوں ميں) ملوث کر ليا (اور نيکي کو دبا ديا)o
null.verse 91:20: اور جس نے اسے خاک میں ملایا وہ خسارے میں رہا
null.verse 91:21: (قوم) ثمود نے اپنی سرکشی کے سبب (پیغمبر کو) جھٹلایا
null.verse 91:22: ثمود نے اپني سرکشي کے باعث (اپنے پيغمبر صالح عليہ السلام کو) جھٹلاياo
null.verse 91:23: جبکہ ان ميں سے ايک بڑا بد بخت اٹھاo
null.verse 91:24: جب ان میں سے ایک نہایت بدبخت اٹھا
null.verse 91:25: تو خدا کے پیغمبر (صالح) نے ان سے کہا کہ خدا کی اونٹنی اور اس کے پانی پینے کی باری سے عذر کرو
null.verse 91:26: ان سے ا? کے رسول نے فرمايا: ا? کي (اس) اونٹني اور اس کو پاني پلانے (کے دن) کي حفاظت کرناo
null.verse 91:27: تو انہوں نے اس (رسول) کو جھٹلا ديا، پھر اس (اونٹني) کي کونچيں کاٹ ڈاليں تو ان کے رب نے ان کے گناہ کي وجہ سے ان پر ہلاکت نازل کر دي، پھر (پوري) بستي کو (تباہ کر کے عذاب ميں سب کو) برابر کر دياo
null.verse 91:28: مگر انہوں نے پیغمبر کو جھٹلایا اور اونٹنی کی کونچیں کاٹ دیں تو خدا نے ان کیگناہ کے سبب ان پر عذاب نازل کیا اور سب کو (ہلاک کر کے) برابر کر دیا
null.verse 91:29: اور اس کو ان کے بدلہ لینے کا کچھ بھی ڈر نہیں
null.verse 91:30: اور ا? کو اس (ہلاکت) کے انجام کا کوئي خوف نہيں ہوتاo نہیں

null.verse 91:1: Қуёш билан ва унинг зиёси билан қасам.
null.verse 91:2: Унинг ортидан келадиган Ой билан қасам.
null.verse 91:3: Ва у(қуёш)ни равшан кўрсатган наҳор билан қасам.
null.verse 91:4: Ва у(қуёш)ни қоплаган тун билан қасам.
null.verse 91:5: Ва осмон билан ва унинг бино қилиниши билан қасам.
null.verse 91:6: Ва ер билан ва унинг тўшалиши билан қасам.
null.verse 91:7: Ва нафс билан ва унинг бекам-кўст қилиб яратилиши билан қасам.
null.verse 91:8: Бас, у(нафс)га фужурини ва тақвосини билдирди.
null.verse 91:9: Батаҳқиқ, ким у(нафс)ни покласа, ютуққа эришади.
null.verse 91:10: Ва батаҳқиқ, ким у(нафс)ни кирласа, ноумид бўлади.
null.verse 91:11: Самуд қавми ўз туғёни ила ( Пай ғамбарини) ёлғонга чиқарди.
null.verse 91:12: Вақтики, (ундаги) энг бадбахт шахс шошилиб турди.
null.verse 91:13: Бас, уларга Аллоҳнинг Расули «Аллоҳнинг туясига ва унинг сувига тегманглар», деди.
null.verse 91:14: Бас, уни ёлғончига чиқаришди ва ул(туяни) сўйишди.
null.verse 91:15: Ва У зот бу ишнинг оқибатидан қўрқмайди.
